api_errors.no_menu: No generated menu does suit defined nutrient parameters. Please, try it again or change your parameters.
containers.layout.content.processing_bac: Shami kebab diablo - it's like eating molten lava.
Lembas bread. One small bite will fill the stomach of a grown man.
Triple fried egg, chilli, chutney sandwich - inspired by reading a book on bacterialogical warfare.
Not too little and not too much - that's important!
If you have pea soup, make sure you eat it before it eats you.
What's taters, precious? What's taters, eh?
Do you really like them that hot sir?
White wolf, did you eat Red Riding Hood?
containers.layout.content.recipe_card.on: Sadly, this recipe exists in the database only in the czech version.
page.form.energy.label: Max. energy
pages.daily_menu.info.description.first_: Summ of daily energy is between 80% and 100% of maximum allowed energy for a day (default maximum energy value is 2000 kcal).
pages.daily_menu.info.description.genera: This tool generates random menu in loop until all conditions are fulfilled. Default conditions are:
pages.daily_menu.info.description.ratios: An error message will appear if conditions are not fulfilled in allowed count of iterations (300 by default). Then you can try generate menu again.
pages.daily_menu.info.description.second: Ratios of fats, proteins and carbs are less or equal of maximum allowed ratio +2.5% tolerance (default ratios are 40% for both of proteins and carbs and 20% for fats).
pages.daily_menu.info.description.sessio: Generated menu will be here for you until you will close this browser tab or generate a new menu.
pages.daily_menu.info.title: Daily Menu Generator
pages.daily_menu.meals.title: Here is your menu for today. Enjoy!
pages.daily_menu.nutrients_table.amount_: Ratio of energy is calculated with refferency value 2000 kcal, the refferency value for fiber is 30 g.
pages.daily_menu.nutrients_table.title: Nutrients table for this day
pages.homepage.about: There should be some important text probably. However, there is only one button, so just click it and let the app serve you :)
pages.homepage.title: Welcome!
pages.homepage.warning: This app should serve as the inspirating recipe generator and it does not substitute the nutrition expert!
pages.not_found.title: Page not found!
